summary: This document is a filing receipt for the incorporation of HBRK Associates Inc. It includes details about the corporation's purpose, registered agent, and the individual responsible for the filing, Richard Kahn. The document outlines the structure and legal standing of the corporation as per New York State law.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is the individual who filed the incorporation documents for HBRK Associates Inc. and is designated as the registered agent for the corporation.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is listed as the incorporator of HBRK Associates Inc., signing the incorporation documents.

connections.description: Richard Kahn is the filer and registered agent for the corporation, while Harry Beller is the incorporator who signed the documents.

locations: 1365 York Avenue, Apt. 28, New York, NY 10021
keyFacts: HBRK Associates Inc. was incorporated on August 29, 2008.
Richard Kahn is both the filer and the registered agent for the corporation.
The corporation is authorized to issue 200 shares without par value.
The office of the corporation is located in New York County, New York.
Harry Beller is listed as the incorporator of the corporation.
